TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl
Public MustInherit Class HierarchicalDataBoundControl Inherits BaseDataBoundControl

Docs.summary: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in hierarchical form.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类是用于从 ASP.NET 层次结构数据源控件中检索数据并将该控件的用户界面元素绑定到该数据以供显示的 ASP.NET 控件的基类。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>。
不使用网页开发人员<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类直接; 相反，它们使用从此类派生的控件。
控件开发人员扩展此类，以创建可与实现的类的数据绑定控件<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>接口和类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>类。 派生类时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类，请替代<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法来检索到的数据绑定控件的用户界面元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法。 在大多数情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法是在派生类中的设置将替代的唯一方法。
对于 ASP.NET 2.0 数据绑定控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法相当于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法，并被调用来将数据绑定在运行时。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类创建自定义的数据绑定控件。 `GeneologyTree`控件呈现`pre`HTML 部分，其中的数据以文本树检索从关联的数据源控件。
[!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#2)]
下面的代码示例演示如何使用`GeneologyTree`控件，在前面的示例中定义并将其绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控件。
[!code-aspx-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/rootviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/rootviewvb.aspx#1)]
在代码示例中所访问的 geneology.xml 文件包含以下数据。
``` <family> <member title="great-grandfather"> <member title="grandfather" > <member title="child" /> <member title="father" > <member title="son" /> </member> </member> </member> </family> ```

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.
Docs.value: 表示数据源的控件的 ID，数据绑定控件从该控件中检索其数据。 默认值为 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法检索<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>对象关联的数据源控件，通过调用从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A>方法。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>调用方法来检索<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>从关联的数据源控件的对象以及如何<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法来检索数据。 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类。
[!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#4)]

Docs.summary: Sets the state of the control in view state as successfully bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件保持视图状态，该值指示是否当前绑定到数据中的值。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A>方法将值设置为`true`。

Docs.summary: Called when one of the base data source identification properties is changed, to re-bind the data-bound control to its data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>方法调用时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>更改页面的任何时间<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用数据绑定控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>方法如果数据绑定控件初始化后更改标识数据源的属性。 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类。
[!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A>设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性`true`情况下，HTTP 请求是回发和启用视图状态，但尚未绑定数据绑定控件中。 这种情况下是常见的控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>在运行时更改控件的可见性的位置。

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void PerformDataBinding ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void PerformDataBinding() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub PerformDataBinding ()
protected public: virtual void PerformDataBinding();
abstract member PerformDataBinding : unit -> unit override this.PerformDataBinding : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 实现此方法，而不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法派生中的数据绑定控件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类。 放置控件的数据绑定中的逻辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>保留<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>以错误的顺序引发的事件。
虽然基<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类提供了此方法中，没有特定实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法以将任何用户界面控件的值绑定到将检索的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>从派生类中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>。 `GeneologyTree`控制循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>和<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>对象从其关联检索<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>，并创建用于绑定到的数据的文本树状结构。 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类。
[!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#4)]

Protected Overrides Sub PerformSelect ()
protected: override void PerformSelect();
override this.PerformSelect : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Retrieves data from the associated data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>后检索数据时，将数据绑定到数据绑定控件的元素调用方法。 派生的类型重写此方法来检索数据，仅当默认实现是不够的。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void ValidateDataSource (object dataSource);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ValidateDataSource(object dataSource) cil managed

override this.ValidateDataSource : obj -> unit

Docs.param: An object set to the property.
Docs.summary: Verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.ValidateDataSource%2A>仅在调用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>为类的赋值函数 (setter)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类将检查为设置对象的类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性以确保它是实例<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>或<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>接口。

Docs.exception: is not and implements neither the nor the interface.
